value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Gather around, everyone! We have
an urgent mission.$k$pThe Emblian army is invading
another world.$k$pIt's the World of Shadows, home of
a legendary Hero—one as important
as Marth himself.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|They're going for Alm? He wielded
Falchion, just like Marth, and rose to
the most heroic heights.$k$pIf Embla goes after Alm...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Exactly. We have much to fear, and
more to prevent. Let's get moving!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, dearest Faye. How nice you are
with a bow, but still you could use a
little help.$k$pSo I'm granting you an exceptional
skill for using your bow.$k$pYou'll learn more from defeating
an enemy with it. What a terror
you'll be soon enough.$k$p$WmMPID_エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Normal,Face|$w0|What? Do you mean that I'll get
better with my bow faster?$k$pThat'll help me fight off all of the
nasty people you said are coming
for Alm!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, yes. Now, please, put holes in
each and every one of those
horrible people.$k$pI believe they've just arrived.
Good luck, dear.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I've got to push myself much harder
if I hope to stand my ground against
people like you.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Never you mind them, Alm. You
haven't even begun to tap into your
full potential.$k$pLet's withdraw. You'll grow into a
ferocious figure in battle soon
enough.$k$pThen you'll have all of our enemies
begging for mercy. What a day that
will be!$k$p$Sbs150|
